Text: Why is it that the first person to post these episodes, always has the file being 3 or 4 times bigger than someone like EZTV who releases a file later thats not even 200 megs? Not complaining, just dont get it.
Maybe because higher compression ratios for audio/video takes considerable time to process?
Or maybe it's because the higher the resolution (720) the bigger the file... just compare it with EZTV's files.

Jackson, when it says PublicHD, or the uploader is DibyaTPB or sceneline, that means the episode is in high resolution.  It's bigger because it's high quality and I prefer it.  eztv and ettv occassionally upload high resolution, but mostly stick with low resolution.

why is it that the first post is always some dumb whiner who can't be bothered to try answering their own question instead of appearing like a complete fool?

they could at least sound less offended / self-righteous in asking their noob questions. like srsly.
